rules.description: Do not collect or output email addresses or phone numbers unless explicit user consent is confirmed.
rules.example_violation: Contact us at example@example.com for more info
rules.suggestion: Ask users to provide contact details via a consent form instead of scraping.

rules.description: Always respect robots.txt and meta tags that prohibit scraping.
rules.example_violation: Robots.txt contains 'Disallow: /private' but scraper ignores it
rules.suggestion: Check and honor robots.txt and noindex/nofollow tags before scraping.

rules.description: Never scrape social media profiles without explicit user consent.
rules.llm_instruction: If user consent is missing, do not scrape social network data and report a BLOCK.
rules.suggestion: Request and document consent from account holders before collecting profile data.

rules.description: Do not scrape content marked with copyright notices or 'all rights reserved'.
rules.suggestion: Use content that is explicitly licensed for reuse.

rules.description: Do not circumvent paywalls or authentication mechanisms while scraping.
rules.example_violation: Using scripts to access premium articles without paying
rules.suggestion: Access only content available without bypassing security or payment barriers.
